++ Waiting Architecture

The WA is how TheSystem registers [Processing] in terms of how long it takes before [Users] can use them.
    * The WA is essentially what occurs after scheduling.


++Architecture

[Applications], [Processing] and [Tasks] that can take variable or specified lengths of time to complete will communicate with notify the WA. The WA then notifies [Users] when the waiting is over.

The WA provides a [Frontend] of currently undergoing tasks.
    * [Loading]
    * Can be used by the ActionOrdering


The idea of a SystemTray icon from Peter Chabada is an idea that the WA will facilitate. Although this will use the existing StandardActionRepresentations.
